title: Do you use a screen protector for your phone?
body: Not once have I ever managed to get a screen protector onto a phone screen without trapping junk into there, messing up the adhesive, and so on and so forth. They go into the trash within a few minutes. Does anyone here use one? Do you just live with the dirt/bubbles, or did you manage to apply it correctly? If the latter, did you do it yourself (how???) or have it professionally done (also how?)?
